responses.rationale: Q1-Q11 did not trigger. The language expresses subjective feeling about preparedness/encouragement, not explicit framing of threat impact. Defaults to Neutral.
Q1-Q11 did not trigger. Reports concerns, potential devastation, possibility, and risk factually. Defaults to Neutral.
Q1-Q11 did not trigger. Strong verb 'overwhelm' on potential scale impact was not sufficient for higher rules. Defaults to Neutral.
Q1-Q11 did not trigger. Comparative intensifier 'much worse problem' on potential issue was not sufficient for higher rules. Defaults to Neutral.
Q1-Q11 did not trigger. Strong verb 'surge' on economic metric was not sufficient for higher rules. Defaults to Neutral.
Q1-Q11 did not trigger. Describes reaction ('on edge') and trend ('on the rise'), factual scale. Defaults to Neutral.
Q1-Q11 did not trigger. Intensifier 'highly' on characteristic 'susceptible' was not sufficient for higher rules. Defaults to Neutral.
Q1-Q11 did not trigger. Vivid description of symptoms was not sufficient for higher rules. Defaults to Neutral.
